mapper.select: /*getCmmnCodeDetailList*/ SELECT A.*, B.CMMN_OBJ_A, B.CMMN_OBJ_B FROM CAM_ERP.T_IFS_ERP_CMMN_CODE_DETAIL A LEFT JOIN CAM_ERP.DJ_CMMN_CODE_OBJ B ON A.CMMN_CODE = B.CMMN_CODE AND A.CMMN_DETAIL_CODE = B.CMMN_DETAIL_CODE WHERE A.CMMN_CODE = #{cmmnCode} ORDER BY A.CMMN_CODE ASC
mapper.delete: /*delCommCodeObject*/ DELETE FROM CAM_ERP.DJ_CMMN_CODE_OBJ WHERE CMMN_CODE = #{cmmnCode} AND CMMN_DETAIL_CODE = #{cmmnDetailCode}
mapper.select: /*getEnaraBudgetCdList*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_ERP.T_IFS_ERP_ASSTN_EXPITM_TAXITM WHERE FSYR = #{fsYear} AND (ASSTN_EXPITM_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{bgNm}, '%') OR ASSTN_TAXITM_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{bgNm}, '%'))
mapper.delete: /*delEnaraBudgetCode*/ DELETE FROM CAM_ERP.DJ_BUDGET_CODE WHERE BUDGET_SN = #{budgetSn} AND FSYR = #{fsyr}
mapper.insert: /*insEnaraBudgetCode*/ INSERT INTO CAM_ERP.DJ_BUDGET_CODE ( BUDGET_SN, FSYR, CNTC_SN, ASSTN_EXPITM_TAXITM_CODE, ASSTN_EXPITM_NM, ASSTN_TAXITM_NM ) VALUES ( #{budgetSn}, #{fsyr}, #{cntcSn}, #{asstnExpitmTaxitmCode}, #{asstnExpitmNm}, #{asstnTaxitmNm} )
mapper.select: /*getEnaraBudgetCdData*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_ERP.DJ_BUDGET_CODE WHERE BUDGET_SN = #{BGT_CD}

/*getProjectList*/ SELECT A.PJT_SN, A.REAL_PJT_CD AS PJT_CD, A.REAL_PJT_NM AS PJT_NM, B.* FROM ( SELECT P.*, IF(PJT_ACCOUNT_SN IS NOT NULL, CONCAT(LEFT(P.PJT_CD, 9), PA.IS_TYPE), P.PJT_CD) AS REAL_PJT_CD, IF(PJT_ACCOUNT_SN IS NOT NULL, CONCAT( CASE WHEN IS_TYPE = '1' THEN '(국비) ' WHEN IS_TYPE = '2' THEN '(도비) ' WHEN IS_TYPE = '3' THEN '(시비) ' WHEN IS_TYPE = '4' THEN '(자부담) ' WHEN IS_TYPE = '5' THEN '(업체부담) ' WHEN IS_TYPE = '9' THEN '(기타) ' END , P.PJT_NM), P.PJT_NM) AS REAL_PJT_NM FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT P LEFT JOIN CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_ACCOUNT PA ON P.PJT_SN = PA.PJT_SN WHERE P.BUSN_CLASS IN ('R', 'S') AND P.TEAM_STAT = 'N' AND P.PJT_CD IS NOT NULL AND RIGHT(P.PJT_CD, 1) != 'T' AND #{year} BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(P.STR_DT, '%Y') AND DATE_FORMAT(P.END_DT, '%Y') ) A LEFT JOIN CAM_ERP.DJ_PROJECT_LINK B ON A.REAL_PJT_CD = B.PJT_CD WHERE 1=1
AND A.REAL_PJT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{pjtNm}, '%')
AND B.LNK_PJT_SN IS NOT NULL
AND A.LNK_PJT_SN IS NULL
ORDER BY A.STR_DT DESC
/*getEnaraPjtData*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_ERP.T_IFS_BSRSLT_ERP WHERE CNTC_SN = #{cntcSn}
/*getEnaraPjtList*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_ERP.T_IFS_BSRSLT_ERP WHERE BSNSYEAR = #{year} AND DDTLBZ_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ddtlbzNm}, '%')
mapper.insert: /*insEnaraProject*/ INSERT INTO CAM_ERP.DJ_PROJECT_LINK ( PJT_SN, PJT_CD, CNTC_SN, BSNSYEAR, DDTLBZ_ID, DDTLBZ_NM, UPPER_BSNS_ID, UPPER_BSNS_NM, REQST_DE ) VALUES ( #{PJT_SN}, #{PJT_CD}, #{CNTC_SN}, #{BSNSYEAR}, #{DDTLBZ_ID}, #{DDTLBZ_NM}, #{UPPER_BSNS_ID}, #{UPPER_BSNS_NM}, #{REQST_DE} )
mapper.select: /*getPayAppDataByPayAppDetSn*/ SELECT A.*, (SELECT EMP_NAME_KR FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE EMP_SEQ = A.REG_EMP_SEQ) AS EMP_NAME, DATE_FORMAT(A.APPROVAL_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS APP_DE, (SELECT DOC_NO FROM DJ_CAMTIC.A_DOC_INFO WHERE DOC_ID = A.DOC_ID) AS DOC_NO, B.BUDGET_NM AS BGT_NM, B.BUDGET_SN AS BGT_SN, B.EVID_TYPE, B.TOT_COST, B.SUP_COST, B.VAT_COST, B.CRM_BNK_NM, IFNULL(B.CRM_SN, "") AS CRM_SN, B.CRM_NM, B.CRM_ACC_NO, B.CARD, IF(B.EVID_TYPE = '3', IF(B.CARD LIKE '%개인카드%', 1, 2), 0) as CARD_TYPE, B.REG_NO, B.ISS_NO, B.AUTH_NO, (SELECT PUCHAS_TKBAK_NO FROM CAM_ERP.T_IFS_CARD_PUCHAS_RECPTN_ERP WHERE REPLACE(CARD_NO,'-','') = REPLACE(B.CARD_NO,'-','') AND PUCHAS_CONFM_NO = B.AUTH_NO) AS PUCHAS_TKBAK_NO, B.TR_DE, B.FILE_NO, IFNULL(B.TR_CD, "") AS TR_CD, C.*, B.ENARA_MNG_STAT FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_PAY_APP A LEFT JOIN CAM_MNG.DJ_PAY_APP_DET B ON A.PAY_APP_SN = B.PAY_APP_SN LEFT JOIN CAM_CRM.DJ_CRM_INFO C ON B.CRM_SN = C.CRM_SN WHERE B.PAY_APP_DET_SN = #{payAppDetSn}

/*getProjectDataByPayAppDetSn*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT A LEFT JOIN CAM_ERP.DJ_PROJECT_LINK B ON A.PJT_SN = B.PJT_SN LEFT JOIN CAM_MNG.DJ_DEPO_SETTING C ON A.PJT_SN = C.FR_PJT_SN WHERE A.PJT_CD = #{PJT_CD} AND A.TEAM_STAT='N'
/*getEnaraBgtDataByPayAppData*/ SELECT T.* FROM CAM_ERP.DJ_BUDGET_CODE T WHERE BUDGET_SN = #{BGT_SN}
/*getEnaraExcDataByEnaraProjectData*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_ERP.T_IFS_BSRSLT_EXC_INSTT_ERP A WHERE DDTLBZ_ID = #{DDTLBZ_ID} ORDER BY CNTC_SN DESC LIMIT 1
/*getCrmDataByPayAppData*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_CRM.DJ_CRM_INFO WHERE CRM_SN = #{CRM_SN}
/*getEnaraBankList*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_ERP.T_IFS_ERP_CMMN_CODE_DETAIL WHERE CMMN_CODE = 1070
mapper.insert:
/*insExcutRequstErp*/ INSERT INTO CAM_ERP.T_IFR_EXCUT_REQUST_ERP ( CNTC_JOB_PROCESS_CODE, INTRFC_ID, TRNSC_ID, FILE_ID, CNTC_CREAT_DT, CNTC_TRGET_SYS_CODE, BSNSYEAR, DDTLBZ_ID, EXC_INSTT_ID, EXCUT_CNTC_ID, EXCUT_TY_SE_CODE, PRUF_SE_CODE, PRUF_SE_NO, EXCUT_REQUST_DE, TRANSFR_ACNUT_SE_CODE, SBSACNT_TRFRSN_CODE, SBSACNT_TRFRSN_CN, BCNC_SE_CODE, BCNC_LSFT_NO, BCNC_CMPNY_NM, BCNC_INDUTY_NM, BCNC_BIZCND_NM, BCNC_RPRSNTV_NM, BCNC_ADRES, BCNC_TELNO, BCNC_BANK_CODE, BCNC_ACNUT_NO, EXCUT_SPLPC, EXCUT_VAT, EXCUT_SUM_AMOUNT, EXCUT_PRPOS_CN, BCNC_BNKB_INDICT_CN, SBSIDY_BNKB_INDICT_CN, PREPAR, EXCUT_EXPITM_TAXITM_CNT ) VALUES ( #{CNTC_JOB_PROCESS_CODE}, #{INTRFC_ID}, #{TRNSC_ID}, #{FILE_ID}, #{CNTC_CREAT_DT}, #{CNTC_TRGET_SYS_CODE}, #{BSNSYEAR}, #{DDTLBZ_ID}, #{EXC_INSTT_ID}, #{EXCUT_CNTC_ID}, #{EXCUT_TY_SE_CODE}, #{PRUF_SE_CODE}, #{PRUF_SE_NO}, #{EXCUT_REQUST_DE}, #{TRANSFR_ACNUT_SE_CODE}, #{SBSACNT_TRFRSN_CODE}, #{SBSACNT_TRFRSN_CN}, #{BCNC_SE_CODE}, #{BCNC_LSFT_NO}, #{BCNC_CMPNY_NM}, #{BCNC_INDUTY_NM}, #{BCNC_BIZCND_NM}, #{BCNC_RPRSNTV_NM}, #{BCNC_ADRES}, #{BCNC_TELNO}, #{BCNC_BANK_CODE}, #{BCNC_ACNUT_NO}, #{EXCUT_SPLPC}, #{EXCUT_VAT}, #{EXCUT_SUM_AMOUNT}, #{EXCUT_PRPOS_CN}, #{BCNC_BNKB_INDICT_CN}, #{SBSIDY_BNKB_INDICT_CN}, #{PREPAR}, #{EXCUT_EXPITM_TAXITM_CNT} )
SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'CAM_ERP' AND TABLE_NAME = 'T_IFR_EXCUT_REQUST_ERP'

/*insEnaraTaxReq*/ INSERT INTO CAM_ERP.DJ_ERP_TAX_REQUEST ( PAY_APP_DET_SN, INTRFC_ID, TRNSC_ID, EXCUT_CNTC_ID, EXCUT_TY_SE_CODE, TRANSFR_ACNUT_SE_CODE, SBSACNT_TRFRSN_CODE, SBSACNT_TRFRSN_CN, BCNC_SE_CODE, BCNC_LSFT_NO, BCNC_CMPNY_NM, BCNC_INDUTY_NM, BCNC_BIZCND_NM, BCNC_RPRSNTV_NM, BCNC_ADRES, BCNC_TELNO, BCNC_BANK_CODE, BCNC_ACNUT_NO, FNRSC_SE_CODE, SPLPC, VAT, SUM_AMOUNT, BCNC_BNKB_INDICT_CN, SBSIDY_BNKB_INDICT_CN ) VALUES ( #{payAppDetSn}, #{INTRFC_ID}, #{TRNSC_ID}, #{EXCUT_CNTC_ID}, #{EXCUT_TY_SE_CODE}, #{TRANSFR_ACNUT_SE_CODE}, #{SBSACNT_TRFRSN_CODE}, #{SBSACNT_TRFRSN_CN}, #{BCNC_SE_CODE}, #{BCNC_LSFT_NO}, #{BCNC_CMPNY_NM}, #{BCNC_INDUTY_NM}, #{BCNC_BIZCND_NM}, #{BCNC_RPRSNTV_NM}, #{BCNC_ADRES}, #{BCNC_TELNO}, #{BCNC_BANK_CODE}, #{BCNC_ACNUT_NO}, #{FNRSC_SE_CODE}, #{EXCUT_SPLPC}, #{EXCUT_VAT}, #{EXCUT_SUM_AMOUNT}, #{BCNC_BNKB_INDICT_CN}, #{SBSIDY_BNKB_INDICT_CN} )
mapper.select: /*getExecRequestCsvList*/ SELECT CNTC_SN, CNTC_JOB_PROCESS_CODE, INTRFC_ID, TRNSC_ID, FILE_ID, CNTC_CREAT_DT, CNTC_TRGET_SYS_CODE, BSNSYEAR, DDTLBZ_ID, EXC_INSTT_ID, EXCUT_CNTC_ID, EXCUT_TY_SE_CODE, PRUF_SE_CODE, PRUF_SE_NO, EXCUT_REQUST_DE, TRANSFR_ACNUT_SE_CODE, SBSACNT_TRFRSN_CODE, SBSACNT_TRFRSN_CN, BCNC_SE_CODE, BCNC_LSFT_NO, BCNC_CMPNY_NM, BCNC_INDUTY_NM, BCNC_BIZCND_NM, BCNC_RPRSNTV_NM, BCNC_ADRES, BCNC_TELNO, BCNC_BANK_CODE, BCNC_ACNUT_NO, EXCUT_SPLPC, EXCUT_VAT, EXCUT_SUM_AMOUNT, EXCUT_PRPOS_CN, BCNC_BNKB_INDICT_CN, SBSIDY_BNKB_INDICT_CN, PREPAR, EXCUT_EXPITM_TAXITM_CNT FROM CAM_ERP.T_IFR_EXCUT_REQUST_ERP WHERE EXCUT_CNTC_ID = #{EXCUT_CNTC_ID}

/*getExecBimokCsvList*/ SELECT CNTC_SN, CNTC_JOB_PROCESS_CODE, INTRFC_ID, TRNSC_ID, FILE_ID, CNTC_CREAT_DT, CNTC_TRGET_SYS_CODE, EXCUT_CNTC_ID, ASSTN_TAXITM_CODE, PRDLST_NM, EXCUT_TAXITM_CNTC_ID, TAXITM_FNRSC_CNT FROM CAM_ERP.T_IFR_EXCUT_EXPITM_ERP WHERE EXCUT_CNTC_ID = #{EXCUT_CNTC_ID}

/*getExecBimokDataCsvList*/ SELECT CNTC_SN, CNTC_JOB_PROCESS_CODE, INTRFC_ID, TRNSC_ID, FILE_ID, CNTC_CREAT_DT, CNTC_TRGET_SYS_CODE, EXCUT_CNTC_ID, EXCUT_TAXITM_CNTC_ID, FNRSC_SE_CODE, SPLPC, VAT, SUM_AMOUNT FROM CAM_ERP.T_IFR_EXCUT_FNRSC_ERP WHERE EXCUT_CNTC_ID = #{EXCUT_CNTC_ID}
mapper.insert: /*insEnaraData*/ INSERT INTO CAM_ERP.DJ_ERP_REQ_STAT ( PAY_APP_DET_SN, TRNSC_ID, REQ_STAT, REQ_ISS ) VALUES ( #{payAppDetSn}, #{TRNSC_ID}, #{REQ_STAT}, #{REQ_ISS} )
/*insEnaraSendTemp*/ INSERT INTO CAM_ERP.DJ_ENARA_TEMP ( PAY_APP_DET_SN, INTRFC_ID, TRNSC_ID, REG_DT ) VALUES ( #{payAppDetSn}, #{INTRFC_ID}, #{TRNSC_ID}, NOW() )
mapper.delete: /*delEnaraTempData*/ DELETE FROM CAM_ERP.DJ_ENARA_TEMP WHERE INTRFC_ID = #{INTRFC_ID} AND TRNSC_ID = #{TRNSC_ID}
mapper.select: /*getErpReqData*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_ERP.DJ_ERP_REQ_STAT WHERE PAY_APP_DET_SN = #{payAppDetSn}
/*getReqStatData*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_ERP.DJ_ERP_REQ_STAT WHERE REQ_STAT_SN = #{reqStatSn}

/*getErpTaxReqData*/ SELECT A.REQ_TAX_SN AS REQ_STAT_SN, A.*, (SELECT CMMN_DETAIL_CODE_NM FROM CAM_ERP.T_IFS_ERP_CMMN_CODE_DETAIL WHERE A.BCNC_BANK_CODE = CMMN_DETAIL_CODE AND CMMN_CODE = '1070') AS BCNC_BANK_CODE_NM FROM CAM_ERP.DJ_ERP_TAX_REQUEST A WHERE PAY_APP_DET_SN = #{payAppDetSn}
/*getTaxReqStatData*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_ERP.DJ_ERP_TAX_REQUEST WHERE REQ_TAX_SN = #{reqStatSn}

/*getExcutRequestErp*/ SELECT A.*, B.CMMN_DETAIL_CODE_NM AS BCNC_BANK_CODE_NM FROM CAM_ERP.T_IFR_EXCUT_REQUST_ERP A LEFT JOIN CAM_ERP.T_IFS_ERP_CMMN_CODE_DETAIL B ON A.BCNC_BANK_CODE = B.CMMN_DETAIL_CODE WHERE A.TRNSC_ID = #{TRNSC_ID} AND B.CMMN_CODE = 1070
/*getExcutExpItmErp*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_ERP.T_IFR_EXCUT_EXPITM_ERP WHERE TRNSC_ID = #{TRNSC_ID}
/*getExcutFnrscErp*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_ERP.T_IFR_EXCUT_FNRSC_ERP WHERE TRNSC_ID = #{TRNSC_ID}

/*getErpSend*/ SELECT A.RSP_MSG, A.RSP_CD, A.TRNSC_ID, B.EXCUT_CNTC_ID, C.PROCESS_RESULT_CODE, C.PROCESS_RESULT_MSSAGE FROM CAM_ERP.DJ_ERP_SEND A LEFT JOIN CAM_ERP.T_IFR_EXCUT_REQUST_ERP B ON A.TRNSC_ID = B.TRNSC_ID LEFT JOIN CAM_ERP.T_IFS_EXCUT_RESULT_ERP C ON B.EXCUT_CNTC_ID = C.EXCUT_CNTC_ID WHERE A.TRNSC_ID = #{TRNSC_ID}
/*getEranaTemp*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_ERP.DJ_ENARA_TEMP WHERE INTRFC_ID = #{INTRFC_ID} AND TRNSC_ID = #{TRNSC_ID}
/*getEnaraTempList*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_ERP.DJ_ENARA_TEMP WHERE 1=1
mapper.insert: /*insDjErpSend*/ INSERT INTO CAM_ERP.DJ_ERP_SEND ( INTRFC_ID, RSP_MSG, RSP_CD, TRNSC_ID, EXCUT_CNTC_ID ) VALUES ( #{intfId}, #{rspMsg}, #{rspCd}, #{intfTrscId}, #{excutCntcId} )
mapper.select: /*getErpSendTrscId*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_ERP.DJ_ERP_SEND WHERE TRNSC_ID = #{intfTrscId}

/*getEtaxInfo*/ SELECT A.PAY_APP_DET_SN, A.ISS_NO, B.TR_NM, B.TRCEO_NM, B.SUM_AM, B.SUP_AM, B.VAT_AM, B.TRREG_NB, C.*, (SELECT EXC_INSTT_ID FROM CAM_ERP.T_IFS_BSRSLT_EXC_INSTT_ERP WHERE DDTLBZ_ID = C.DDTLBZ_ID ORDER BY CNTC_SN DESC LIMIT 1) AS EXC_INSTT_ID FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_PAY_APP_DET A LEFT JOIN CAM_MNG.DJ_ETAX_INFO B ON A.ISS_NO = B.ISS_NO LEFT JOIN CAM_ERP.DJ_PROJECT_LINK C ON C.PJT_CD = (SELECT PJT_CD FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_PAY_APP WHERE PAY_APP_SN = A.PAY_APP_SN) WHERE PAY_APP_DET_SN = #{payAppDetSn} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: /*insEtaxData*/ INSERT INTO CAM_ERP.T_IFR_ETXBL_REQUST_ERP ( CNTC_JOB_PROCESS_CODE, INTRFC_ID, TRNSC_ID, FILE_ID, CNTC_CREAT_DT, CNTC_TRGET_SYS_CODE, BSNSYEAR, DDTLBZ_ID, EXC_INSTT_ID, ETXBL_CONFM_NO ) VALUES ( #{CNTC_JOB_PROCESS_CODE}, #{INTRFC_ID}, #{TRNSC_ID}, '', #{CNTC_CREAT_DT}, #{CNTC_TRGET_SYS_CODE}, #{BSNSYEAR}, #{DDTLBZ_ID}, #{EXC_INSTT_ID}, #{ETXBL_CONFM_NO} )
mapper.select: /*sendResultEtaxData*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_ERP.T_IFR_ETXBL_REQUST_ERP A WHERE ETXBL_CONFM_NO = #{ISS_NO} LIMIT 1
/*getResEtsblData*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_ERP.T_IFS_ETXBL_RESULT_ERP WHERE ETXBL_CONFM_NO = #{ISS_NO} ORDER BY CNTC_SN DESC LIMIT 1
/*getInterfaceList*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_ERP.DJ_INTERFACE WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY INF_SN DESC

/*getCardPuchasRecptnList*/ SELECT A.*, (SELECT CMMN_DETAIL_CODE_NM FROM CAM_ERP.T_IFS_ERP_CMMN_CODE_DETAIL WHERE A.CRDCO_CODE = CMMN_DETAIL_CODE AND CMMN_CODE = '1890') AS CRDCO_CODE_NM, (SELECT CMMN_DETAIL_CODE_NM FROM CAM_ERP.T_IFS_ERP_CMMN_CODE_DETAIL WHERE A.PUCHAS_SE_CODE = CMMN_DETAIL_CODE AND CMMN_CODE = '0580') AS PUCHAS_SE_CODE_NM, (SELECT CMMN_DETAIL_CODE_NM FROM CAM_ERP.T_IFS_ERP_CMMN_CODE_DETAIL WHERE A.OVSEA_USE_SE_CODE = CMMN_DETAIL_CODE AND CMMN_CODE = '1610') AS OVSEA_USE_SE_CODE FROM CAM_ERP.T_IFS_CARD_PUCHAS_RECPTN_ERP A WHERE 1=1
AND SUBSTRING(A.CARD_NO,-4) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{srchCardNo}, '%')
mapper.update: /*cancelEnaraPayAppStatus*/ UPDATE CAM_MNG.DJ_PAY_APP_DET SET ENARA_MNG_STAT = 'N' WHERE PAY_APP_DET_SN = #{payAppDetSn}
